rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Reception Area
rooms.description: Large entry with reception area designed to greet visitors and align with Vastu principles by facing the east, ensuring auspicious energy enters.

rooms.name: Living Room & Dining Area
rooms.description: Open space connecting to the garden with large windows for natural light. Bohemian decor and rustic elements incorporated.

rooms.name: Open Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern yet Bohemian open kitchen with natural stones and wooden accents. Vastu principles ensure fire element is balanced.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen, featuring rustic wooden tables and warm lighting.

rooms.name: Library & Study Area
rooms.description: Cozy library with bookshelves, ambient lighting, and a quiet zone for reading and meditation. Placed in the northeast to encourage mental clarity.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 1 (South)
rooms.description: Bohemian-style bedroom with a private balcony, large window seating area. Vastu oriented south for stability and wealth.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 2 (North)
rooms.description: Bohemian-style bedroom with a private balcony, designed for relaxation and creativity. Faced north to enhance clarity.

openings.description: Large arched front door designed for welcoming energy, in accordance with Vastu guidelines.
Large windows enhancing natural light and ventilation.
Window to ensure balanced airflow in the kitchen area.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3 with Balcony
rooms.description: Bohemian-styled bedroom with a private balcony, ensuring privacy and natural light.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4 with Balcony
rooms.description: Bohemian-styled bedroom with a private balcony. Faced west for balanced energy.

rooms.name: Bedroom 5 with Balcony
rooms.description: Bohemian-styled bedroom, featuring a balcony and ample natural lighting.

rooms.name: Bedroom 6 with Balcony
rooms.description: Final Bohemian bedroom with a private balcony, perfect for bachelor pad vibes.

openings.description: Open staircase linking ground and first floor, ensuring natural light flow.
Balcony windows providing panoramic views and enhanced ventilation.

rooms.name: Study Nook & Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A cozy study nook converted into a guest bedroom, offering additional space and privacy.

openings.description: Small window for natural light and ventilation.
